content: Just like The Scorpionlord, you won't be able to fight Daoist Mi if you head straight for The Duskveil. We'd recommend tackling him second, as you make your way up to Cloudnest Peak.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 4', specifically from the subsection 'Daoist Mi' and the sub-subsection 'Don't Miss This Boss!'.
The content is as follows:
Just like The Scorpionlord, you won't be able to fight Daoist Mi if you head straight for The Duskveil. We'd recommend tackling him second, as you make your way up to Cloudnest Peak.
